author: vors
body:
## Steps to reproduce
- Get linux VM for rdp, i.e. from [azure](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/virtual-machines-linux-classic-remote-desktop/)
- RDP there
- Run terminal emulator
- Install and run powershell
- Try to tab-complete anything
## Expected behavior

Tab-complete works
## Actual behavior

Tab-complete doesn't works
## Environment data

<!-- If running the latest released version, specify the version, i.e. -->

v0.4.0

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Can you post all you TERM variables?

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Actually, it doesn't work with `bash` ever :(
Probably problem on my end

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Most likely mismatched TERM. Your emulator is sending tab as one thing, and your program is expecting another.

title: rdp + console emulator + powershell : Tab-Completion doesn't work
